name: PlaygroundPage.AssessmentStatus
desc: The values you use to communicate whether a learner has passed, failed, or not yet finished the task on a page.

items.name: case pass(message: String?)
items.desc: An assessment that communicates that a learner has successfully completed a task.

items.name: case fail(hints: [String], solution: String?)
items.desc: An assessment that communicates that a learner hasn't successfully completed a task.
